verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: Attorney General Jeff Sessions] [ARGM-MNR: forcefully] [V: rebuked] [ARG1: critics who fault the Trump administration for the separation of illegal immigrant families at the border] , [ARGM-ADV: saying that the Obama administration 's policies are partially to] blame.</p >
